1.title: Forged in Fire All Stars

episode of.title: Forged In Fire: Knife Or Death (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: For the first time ever, seven Forged in Fire favorites will use their custom made, historical weapons to slice, stab, and chop their way through a series of punishing challenges built to test blades and competitors alike. Which expertly crafted blade will stand up to the test? Will the course overwhelm the youngest Forged in Fire champion? Or will the two-handed Falchion come out on top? The two competitors with the fastest times will advance to face the epic final course -- "Dead Run." Only one moves on to the finale and has a chance to win the $20,000 grand prize ...

2.title: Blade Runners

episode of.title: Forged In Fire: Knife Or Death (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Experienced bladesmiths, martial artists, and a professional chef bring their custom built blades to a series of grueling challenges that push their skills and their weapons to the limit. Can a 95 pound martial artist muscle through the course? And will the 47 inch Iberian Montante blade prove that size does matter? Or will craftsmanship make an English Billhook a cut above? The top two competitors advance to take on the punishing final course -- "Dead Run." Only one blade and its wielder will advance with the hope of winning $20,000 and the title of Knife or Death ...

3.title: Enter the Yatagan

episode of.title: Forged In Fire: Knife Or Death (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: America's top bladesmiths and martial artists bring their custom made, historical weapons to slice, stab, and chop their way through a series of grueling challenges designed to test both blades and competitors. Can a Yatagan Sabre hybrid survive the course? Or will a two-handed Bowie be the blade to beat? And will one of the female blade wielders accomplish a Knife or Death first? The fastest two competitors move onto the daunting final course -- "Dead Run." Only one will advance to the finale and the chance to win $20,000 and be crowned Knife or Death Champion.

4.title: American Choppers

episode of.title: Forged In Fire: Knife Or Death (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: In the gripping season finale, the bladesmiths, martial artists, and professional chef who made it through the punishing course once return to face off in the winner-take-all final showdown.

8.title: $20,000 Dead Run

episode of.title: Forged In Fire: Knife Or Death (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: In the gripping season finale, the bladesmiths, martial artists, and professional chef who made it through the punishing course once return to face off in the winner-take-all final showdown. Their blades will have to work twice as hard to endure the super-sized challenges they'll face this time around. Will a Cleaver cut through the noise? Does a Kukri Machete have what it takes to earn the crown? Or will it be a Longsword all the way? The fastest two will compete on the souped-up grand finale "Dead Run" course. Only one can be left standing as the Knife or Death ...

episode of.title: Forged In Fire: Knife Or Death (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: In this new series hosted by Bill Goldberg, America's top bladesmiths, martial artists, and weapons experts face off in the most extreme knife competition ever created.

2.plot: Bladesmiths, martial arts experts, and even a butcher must use their custom made, historical weapons to slice, stab, and chop their way through a series of punishing challenges built to test weapons and competitors alike.

3.title: A Fish Called Lifeline

episode of.title: Forged In Fire: Knife Or Death (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Expert bladesmiths, martial artists, and a competition cutting champion bring their best edged-weapons to chop, stab, and slice through an exhausting set of challenges built to push blades and blade-wielding skills to the limit.

4.title: Super Smash Bros.

4.plot: Experienced blade smiths, martial artists, and weapons experts bring their custom built blades to a series of grueling challenges that push their skills and their weapons to the limit. Does the Celtiberian Ring Pommel Knife stand a chance against the course?

5.title: The Kukri Monster

episode of.title: Forged In Fire: Knife Or Death (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: America's top blade smiths, martial artists, and even a stuntman bring their hand-made, historical weapons to chop, slice, and stab through taxing challenges that test their skills and blades. Can one competitor show that his antique Barong was made to last? Will a Kukri/Bowie hybrid prove that two blade styles are better than one? Will the season's youngest bladesmith surprise or get cut down? The final two competitors will face off on the dreaded final course -- "Dead Run." Only one moves on to the grand finale for the chance to win $20,000 and be crowned Knife or ...

6.title: Last Action Hero

episode of.title: Forged In Fire: Knife Or Death (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: In the epic season finale, the bladesmiths, martial artists, and knife thrower who survived the intimidating course are back to prove their skills in the winner-take-all final showdown.

imdb.plot outline: A gauntlet of chopping and hacking tests has competitors run an obstacle course that tests the strength and sharpness of their blades. Strength and technique is also a factor, as each individual try's to make it past two rounds and into the season finale, "The Grand Champion Showdown" for a $20 000 prize.
imdb.title: Forged In Fire: Knife Or Death
plot: A gauntlet of chopping and hacking tests has competitors run an obstacle course that tests the strength and sharpness of their blades. Strength and technique is also a factor, as each individual try's to make it past two rounds and into the season finale, "The Grand Champion Showdown" for a $20 000 prize.::Steve Clayton
